name: Stealth Prototype (lukephilipps)
description:
A small prototype of a stealth game final project.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Control - Crouch
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact (only grabs plushy right now)
  • ESC - Close game

Our team roles were and are as follows:

  • Kaycee - Level design and production.
  • William - 3D modeling, texture art.
  • Brett - Sound/Music design and composition.
  • Izzy - 2D art, UI and texturing.
  • Alexandria - 3D modeling.
  • Luke - Gameplay programming.
